query:
SELECT 
  'Total tasks' as metric, COUNT(*) as count, NULL as detail FROM tasks WHERE projectId = 2723
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Tasks by status', COUNT(*), status FROM tasks WHERE projectId = 2723 GROUP BY status
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Tasks assigned to user 1', COUNT(*), assignedTo FROM tasks WHERE projectId = 2723 AND assignedTo = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Tasks with no assignee', COUNT(*), NULL FROM tasks WHERE projectId = 2723 AND assignedTo IS NULL;
